2.synopsis: This pair are a young couple dreaming about their future plans in Baldur's Gate. They're optimistic-- as long as they have each other, they'll make things work. Early/ mid-20s, youthful enthusiasm.

2_4.speaker: Danis
2_4.text: I suppose we'll start in the Outer City, get a little business going...
2_4.context: NodeContext: The excitement of a young couple making plans

2_25.speaker: Bex
2_25.text: Your spiced tea is life-changing. And I can bake up almond cakes twenty at a time!
2_25.context: NodeContext: The excitement of a young couple making plans

2_96.speaker: Bex
2_96.text: And we'll have a dog, right?
2_96.context: NodeContext: Enthusiastic, planning for the future.

2_37.speaker: Danis
2_37.text: They don't allow 'em in Baldur's Gate. Cats, though...
2_37.context: NodeContext: Enthusiastic, planning for the future.

2_32.speaker: Bex
2_32.text: A little orange cat! And a house with a little door so it can come and go as it pleases.
2_32.context: NodeContext: Enthusiastic, planning for the future.

2_92.speaker: Danis
2_92.text: What'll we name it? I like 'Geoffrey.'
2_92.context: NodeContext: Enthusiastic, planning for the future.

2_47.speaker: Player
2_47.text: Idle chatter. Have you nothing better to do?

2_11.speaker: Danis
2_11.text: No harm in fantasizing about the future. Or don't they do that wherever you're from?
2_11.context: NodeContext: Won't let the player bring them down. Speaking to githyanki player.

2_20.speaker: Player
2_20.text: I have but one plan: to earn the favour of my beloved Queen Vlaakith.

2_84.speaker: Bex
2_84.text: I'm... sure you'll do just that. Right, Danis?
2_84.context: NodeContext: Suspicious of player, playing along because player has started saying weird shit.

2_19.speaker: Danis
2_19.text: Sure. Yes. Queen Vlaakith and everything.
2_19.context: NodeContext: Suspicious of player, playing along because player has started saying weird shit.

2_66.speaker: Player
2_66.text: I aim to purge the parasite infecting my brain.

2_34.speaker: Bex
2_34.context: NodeContext: Suspicious of player, playing along because player has started saying weird shit.

2_26.speaker: Danis
2_26.text: Rest a bit. We're leaving soon. You'll like Baldur's Gate. It's for all sorts.

2_2.speaker: Player
2_2.text: What is this 'cat' you speak of?

2_63.speaker: Bex
2_63.text: Small. Whiskers. 'Meow meow'. You know. Cat.
2_63.context: NodeContext: Trying to get player to know what she means by 'cat'. Playful.

2_87.speaker: Bex
2_87.text: Right. Erm. Danis, we've got to do the thing... in the place... over there. Remember?
2_87.context: NodeContext: Realizing player is a total weirdo, trying to get away.

2_78.speaker: Danis
2_78.context: NodeContext: Playing along with Bex to escape weird player.

2_33.speaker: Player
2_33.text: What use do you have of this creature?

2_95.speaker: Bex
2_95.text: Well, they're excellent mousers. And their little faces are so cute!
2_95.context: NodeContext: Spoken like a cat lover.

2_24.speaker: Danis
2_24.text: Where are you from where there are no cats, by the by?
2_24.context: NodeContext: Deep curiosity about the player, still friendly but a tinge of suspicion

2_93.speaker: Player
2_93.text: I hail from another plane. Is that not obvious?

2_36.speaker: Danis
2_36.text: Hm. Right. Well, welcome to the Sword Coast.
2_36.context: NodeContext: Thinks player is very strange, but still friendly

2_76.speaker: Bex
2_76.text: Come with us to Baldur's Gate. If cats are new to you, you won't believe what you'll find there.
2_76.context: NodeContext: Thinks player is very strange, but still friendly

2_29.speaker: Player
2_29.text: I am from a land far from here.

2_81.speaker: Danis
2_81.text: I figured. But no matter. We're going to make ourselves a new home in Baldur's Gate. You can too.
2_81.context: NodeContext: Thinks player is very strange, but still friendly

2_86.speaker: Bex
2_86.text: Travel with us, if you like. Maybe we can show you to squirrels and ducks on the way.

2_45.speaker: Danis
2_45.context: NodeContext: HAs been rebuffed by player. No real interest in player anymore.

2_85.speaker: Danis
2_85.text: Where were we, love? A cat and a house with a porch...
2_85.context: NodeContext: Ignoring player now, talkign to Danis again cause player is a weirdo.

2_61.speaker: Player
2_61.text: Are you attracted to these... cats?

2_5.speaker: Bex
2_5.context: NodeContext: Shocked, player just implied she's attracted to cats. Not upset, just really surprised.

2_71.speaker: Bex
2_71.text: Look - whoever you are, whatever you're into, you'll find it in Baldur's Gate. I only have eyes for this one here.
2_71.context: NodeContext: Defending herself against players accusation of being into cats.

2_18.speaker: Player
2_18.text: Ah, yes - I know the beasts. Insufficiently meaty.

2_49.speaker: Danis
2_49.text: Oh really? What do you suggest then?

2_22.speaker: Player
2_22.text: It is a beast of burden. It requires no name.

2_56.speaker: Danis
2_56.text: Beast of burden? It's a kitty-cat, not a rothé.

2_89.speaker: Player
2_89.text: A powerful githyanki name should suffice: 'Krak'jthak'.

2_31.speaker: Danis
2_31.text: 'Crack-what'? Gone gods, It's just a kitty-cat.

2_72.speaker: Bex
2_72.text: 'Geoffrey' is great. Let's go with that.

2_53.speaker: Player
2_53.text: I couldn't say. Only varsh name githyanki young.

2_21.speaker: Danis
2_21.text: Let's start with one and see how it goes.

2_50.speaker: Danis
2_50.text: ... and a high fence to keep eavesdroppers out.
2_50.context:
NodeContext: Just now noticing the player. Following Bex's line: 'And a house with a little door so it can come and go as it pleases.' A little wary but not too bad
-- who is this perosn who's approached them?

2_69.speaker: Player
2_69.text: Don't mind me. I was just passing through.

2_10.speaker: Danis
2_10.text: No bother. We're just daydreaming, anyhow.
2_10.context: NodeContext: Friendly again-- player doesn't mean harm.

2_68.speaker: Bex
2_68.text: What about you? Big plans for when you get to the city?

2_73.speaker: Player
2_73.text: I want a new life, entirely. To be a wholly new person.

2_42.speaker: Player
2_42.text: I'm worried the Baldurians are going to rob me for all I'm worth. I'm quite clueless.

2_75.speaker: Player
2_75.text: Knowing me, there is a high chance I will start a fire and be sent to jail.

2_38.speaker: Player
2_38.text: A pint and a clean room would do me a world of good.

2_16.speaker: Danis
2_16.context: NodeContext: Contemplating a pint and a clean room. Sounds luxurious!

2_79.speaker: Bex
2_79.text: Won't be long now. One more trip, then we can really rest.

2_7.speaker: Player
2_7.text: Plans? Just surviving the journey is ambitious enough already.

2_35.speaker: Danis
2_35.text: Luck's been on our side this far. No reason to think it'll run out now.
2_35.context: NodeContext: Looking on the bright side

2_28.speaker: Bex
2_28.text: Optimism, my friend. Try it out.

2_52.speaker: Danis
2_52.text: Oh. That's too bad. I'd heard you were good in a fight.

2_58.speaker: Player
2_58.text: I'll be keeping to myself. People tend to stare at me.

2_90.speaker: Danis
2_90.text: But... I've heard there's all sorts in the city. It might not be like it was in Elturel. I mean - in Baldur's Gate, they give you a chance.

2_27.speaker: Bex
2_27.text: Good luck to you. Wish us a little too. I think we'll all need it.

2_67.speaker: Narrator
2_67.text: *Surely destined for the slaughter. What would be more perfect than to die by your love's side, and know love was not enough?*

2_77.speaker: Player
2_77.text: I've never been to Baldur's Gate before. Perhaps I can drop in on you.

2_17.speaker: Danis
2_17.text: May your ale be dark, and the loving sweet!

2_1.speaker: Bex
2_1.text: Good luck to you, then. And wish us some too!
2_1.context: NodeContext: Positive again, won't let the player bring them down.

2_40.speaker: Player
2_40.text: It's The Blushing Mermaid for me. Bit rough, but the ale's cheap.

2_94.speaker: Danis
2_94.text: We've had enough rough to last us a good long while.
2_94.context: NodeContext: Lightly feigned politeness, like refusing a yucky dish.

2_64.speaker: Player
2_64.text: I'll be seeking the warmth of the Elfsong Tavern.

2_41.speaker: Bex
2_41.text: I think I've heard of that place. Something about a stuffed dragon's head in one of the dining rooms...

2_65.speaker: Bex
2_65.text: It's settled, Danis. You, me, and the Elfsong Tavern, first thing when we arrive.

2_23.speaker: Bex
2_23.text: If we see you there, we'll get you a pint. For your finder's fee.

2_9.speaker: Player
2_9.text: Sorry, didn't mean to interrupt. Good luck to you both.

2_8.speaker: Danis
2_8.text: Thanks. I suppose we'll all need it.
2_8.context: NodeContext: Gentle enthusiasm. Slight caution in voice, but still positive.

2_14.speaker: Player
2_14.text: Two tiefling refugees? You'll be lucky to get a square of dirt at a public house.

2_13.speaker: Danis
2_13.text: If that's what we're offered, we'll take it. Everyone's got to start somewhere.
2_13.context: NodeContext: Player tried to bring them down, but Danis and Bex are having none of it.
